Host Patrick Elliott speaks with military expert Leonid Nersisyan about Armenia's military reforms following the 2020 war. They discuss ongoing changes to modernize Armenia's armed forces through professionalization, military doctrine changes, and domestic industry development.

entry.title: ีึีฃีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีกีพีฅึ ึ ีฐีกีพีฏีซีฉีถีฅึโค ีกึึีกีญึีซ 23-ีกีดีตีก ิทีฌีซีถีกีตีซ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีจ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด

media:group.media:title: ีึีฃีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีกีพีฅึ ึ ีฐีกีพีฏีซีฉีถีฅึโค ีกึึีกีญึีซ 23-ีกีดีตีก ิทีฌีซีถีกีตีซ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีจ ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด
media:group.media:description:
ิฑึึีกีญีซึ ีฟีฅีฒีกีฐีกีถีพีกีฎ 23-ีกีดีตีก ิทีฌีซีถีก ิฒีกีฌีกีฝีกีถีตีกีถีจ ีคีฅีผ ีทึีปีกึีกีฏีดีกีถ ึ ึีฅึีซึ ีง ีฝีธีพีธึีฅีฌ ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีฅีฌ ีฝีฅึีกีฏีกีถ ีฃีธึีฎีถ ีธึ ีกีตีคีบีฅีฝ ีฐีธีฃีกีฌ ีกีบึีธึีฝีฟีจ. ิฑึึีกีญีธึีด ีธึีถีฅึ ึีธึึีซีฏ ีขีกีถีปีกึีกีถีธึ, ีธึีจ ึึีฏีธึีด ีงึ ีทึีปีกึีกีฏีดีกีถ ึ ึีฅึีซีถึ ีีกึ ีดีฅีฒีพีกีขีธึีฎีธึีฉีตีกีดีข ีงึ ีฆีขีกีฒีพีธึีดึ ิฑีตีฝึ ึ ีงีฌ ิฑึึีกีญีซึ ีคีธึึีฝ ีง ีซึ ีฃีธึีฎีจ ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีฅีฌ, ีธึีบีฅีฝีฆีซ ีฃีธึีดีกึ ีพีกีฝีฟีกีฏีซ ีธึ ีจีถีฟีกีถีซึีจ ีบีกีฐีซ. ีธึีธีทีฅีฌ ีง ึ ึีฃีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีฐีกีพีฅึีซ ีธึ ีฐีกีพีฏีซีฉีซ ีพีกีณีกีผึ ีฝีฏีฝีฅีฌึ ิณีกีฒีกึีกึีจ ีฃีกีฒีฉีซึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีง ีกีผีกีปีกึีฅีฌ, ีขีกีตึ ีฏีกีบีพีกีฎ ีง ีฐีฅีถึ ีฃีกีฒีฉีซ ีณีกีถีกีบีกึีฐีซีถ ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีธึีถีฅึีกีฎีซ ีฐีฅีฟึ ิฑีตีฝึ ึ ิทีปีดีซีกีฎีซีถ ึีกีฒีกึีธึีด ีฐีกีพีกีขีธึีฎีธึีฉีตีกีดีข ีง ีฆีขีกีฒีพีธึีด, ีขีกีตึ ีฎึีกีฃึีธึีด ีง ีฃีตีธึีฒ ีฟีฅีฒีกึีธีญีพีฅีฌ ีธึ ีกีตีถีฟีฅีฒ ีกีพีฅีฌีซ ีฆีกึีฃีกึีถีฅีฌ ีซึ ีฃีธึีฎีจึ

entry.title: Yerevan city council facing new threat of opposition boycott

media:group.media:title: Yerevan city council facing new threat of opposition boycott
media:group.media:description:
๐The chances Yerevan may rerun last yearโs local elections were raised after the former leader of a fringe party called for a boycott of all future city council sessions. ๐Yerevan city council plans to debate public transport fare hikes, including introducing a new tiered pricing model that would raise the average ride price by about 20 cents. ๐Authorities now believe a natural gas leak caused yesterdayโs deadly explosion in a residential neighborhood in Yerevan, which left two people dead and two others injured. ๐The family of ex-President Armen Sarkissian owns five previously undisclosed properties in the United Kingdom, according to a joint investigation by CivilNet and media partners.

entry.title: โThe values I inherited from my forefathers is my competitive advantage,โ Viktoria Kechumyan

media:group.media:title: โThe values I inherited from my forefathers is my competitive advantage,โ Viktoria Kechumyan
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, we explore the life of Viktoria Kechumyan and her journey as a young entrepreneur committed to tech startups, blockchain, crypto, and Web 3. We discuss the elements required to thrive as an entrepreneur and to succeed with startups. Today, we explore the inner drives and motivations that have led Viktoria through her career in tech startups. We dive into matters of entrepreneurship, family roots, mindset, curiosity, and passion.
About Viktoria Kechumyan
Viktoria Kechumyan is a manager at Service Titan, the worldโs leading and fastest-growing software technology unicorn company that helps small business entrepreneurs run and grow their businesses. In 2018, she joined Nooor, a Web 3 Company supporting blockchain businesses, developers, and startups, as Chief Operation Officer, then became its Chief Executive Officer. She has also developed several startup projects throughout the process and helped launch Chainpoint, the international blockchain conference in Armenia, as well as โLuman,โ a startup aimed at helping children with environmental education. Viktoria holds a Bachelorโs from Yerevan State Universityโs Faculty of Economics and Management, and an MBA from the same university.
Program Overview Mindful Leaders dives into the stories of people who have achieved prominence, walked incredible journeys, and have defined culture.
Lara sits down with specialists, thinkers, and change catalysts to deconstruct insights, events, and lessons that have shaped their personal and professional lives and have enabled them to create meaning and connection.
00:00 Childhood 1:59 The truth about being an entrepreneur 6:02 Interest in the tech sector 7:41 Curiosity or creativity? 8:47 The relevance of university today 14:46 Passion and skillsets in entrepreneurship 19:36 Cultivating a strong mindset 25:43 The key role that grandparents shaped and motivated me 30:11 The meaning of life 33:26 Conclusion
